name: DocumentLoader@3246
description: Loads and extracts text content from documents of various formats, including PDF and DOC, returning the content as a string.

outputs.description: The extracted text content from the document. In cases where the document contains non-text elements, only the textual components are returned, and non-text elements are ignored or handled accordingly.

name: KnowledgeQuery@7421
description: Queries knowledge data using a natural language query to find the most relevant information.

inputs.content: Summarize the content of the loaded document from DocumentLoader@3246.

outputs.description: A JSON string containing the top k relevant pieces of information extracted from the knowledge data, including their relevance scores.

name: OpenAIAgent@5548
description: A specialized language model tailored for executing specific tasks by processing structured inputs. This agent can be used for additional text generation or summarization tasks if needed.

inputs.content: You are tasked with generating a summary of the content for the instructor to listen to during breakfast.
